## Field.setTooltip() method

Sets the tooltip for this field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setTooltip(newTip: Tooltip.TipInfo | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newTip | [Tooltip.TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.tipinfo_typealias.md) \| null | The text for the tooltip, a function that returns the text for the tooltip, a parent object whose tooltip will be used, or null to display the tooltip of the parent block. To not display a tooltip pass the empty string. |

**Returns:**

void
